title: README update - additional install option
body_html:
Ubuntu 16.04 w/ CUDA 8.0 & cudnn. Anaconda python 2.7.

*******:~$ pip install https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/archive/master.zip --upgrade
Collecting https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/archive/master.zip
  Downloading https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/archive/master.zip (1.7MB)
    100% |████████████████████████████████| 1.7MB 411kB/s 
Requirement already up-to-date: pyyaml in ./anaconda/lib/python2.7/site-packages (from torch==0.1)
Installing collected packages: torch
  Found existing installation: torch 0.1
    Uninstalling torch-0.1:
      Successfully uninstalled torch-0.1
  Running setup.py install for torch ... done
Successfully installed torch-0.1

body:
Ubuntu 16.04 w/ CUDA 8.0 & cudnn. Anaconda python 2.7.

```
*******:~$ pip install https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/archive/master.zip --upgrade
Collecting https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/archive/master.zip
  Downloading https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/archive/master.zip (1.7MB)
    100% |████████████████████████████████| 1.7MB 411kB/s 
Requirement already up-to-date: pyyaml in ./anaconda/lib/python2.7/site-packages (from torch==0.1)
Installing collected packages: torch
  Found existing installation: torch 0.1
    Uninstalling torch-0.1:
      Successfully uninstalled torch-0.1
  Running setup.py install for torch ... done
Successfully installed torch-0.1
```
